text: The Charles Penn Edmunds House, on Rocky Hill Road / Kentucky Route 1297 in Barren County, Kentucky near Beckton, is a Federal-style brick house which was built in c.1836-37. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1983. Captain William Edmunds received this land as a military grant; his grandson Charles Penn Edmunds built the house. The house has ption Flemish bond brickwork at the front and common bond on the sides. title: Charles Penn Edmunds House
